attributes.action: Let us have the right to buy our homes in Scotland
attributes.background: I have been a single mum all my life, bringing up 2 children on my own with no financial help. I have lived in council and housing associations for 25 years and have never been in a position to buy my home until now. I have now found out that the government are abolishing the right to buy, why?

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't decide whether to have a Right to Buy in Scotland. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
